languages.text: "Не напоминай. У меня приятель в блюстителях есть... был. Сгинул, когда эти проклятые выродки от варп-колдовства взбесились".
"Don't even remind me. I have a friend in the enforcers... Well, I had a friend. He perished when those bloody degenerates went mad with warp sorcery."
languages.original_text: "Не напоминай. У меня приятель в блюстителях есть... был. Сгинул, когда эти проклятые выродки от варп-колдовства взбесились".

traits.locale_text: "Don't even remind me. I have a friend among the guards… Well, I had a friend. He perished when these bloody degenerates went mad with Warp sorcery."
"Don't even remind me. I have a friend among the guards… Well, I had a friend. He perished when these bloody degenerates went mad with Warp sorcery."
"Don't even remind me. I have a friend in the guards... Well, I had a friend. He perished when those bloody degenerates went mad with warp sorcery."
"Don't even remind me. I have a friend in the guards... Well, I had a friend. He perished when those bloody degenerates went mad with warp sorcery."
"Don't even remind me. I have a friend in the enforcers... Well, I had a friend. He perished when those bloody degenerates went mad with warp sorcery."

languages.text: “用不着你提醒，我有个朋友就是执法者……确切地说，他生前是执法者。那群该死的疯子瞎搞亚空间巫术的时候，他不幸遇难了。”
languages.original_text: "Don't even remind me. I have a friend in the enforcers... Well, I had a friend. He perished when those bloody degenerates went mad with warp sorcery."

traits.locale_text: “用不着你提醒，我有个朋友就是镇压者……确切地说，他生前是镇压者。那群该死的疯子瞎搞亚空间巫术的时候，他不幸遇难了。”

languages.text: «No me lo recuerdes. Tengo un amigo en seguridad... bueno, tenía. Murió cuando esos malditos degenerados enloquecieron por la hechicería disforme».
languages.original_text: "Don't even remind me. I have a friend in the enforcers... Well, I had a friend. He perished when those bloody degenerates went mad with warp sorcery."

traits.locale_text: «No me lo recuerdes. Tengo un amigo en seguridad... bueno, tenía. Murió cuando esos malditos degenerados enloquecieron por la hechicería disforme».

languages.text: 「思いださせないでくれ。エンフォーサーの友人がいるんだ…いや、エンフォーサーの友人がいた、んだ。歪み魔術で血に飢えた堕落者が豹変したときに、そいつは命を落としたんだよ」
languages.original_text: "Don't even remind me. I have a friend in the enforcers... Well, I had a friend. He perished when those bloody degenerates went mad with warp sorcery."

traits.locale_text: 「思いださせないでくれ。エンフォーサーの友人がいるんだ…いや、エンフォーサーの友人がいた、んだ。歪み魔術で血に飢えた堕落者が豹変したときに、そいつは命を落としたんだよ」

languages.text: "Erinnert mich nicht daran. Ich habe einen Freund bei den Enforcers. Das heißt, ich hatte einen Freund. Er starb, als diese verdammten Degenerierten mit Warp-Zauberei durchgedreht haben."
languages.original_text: "Don't even remind me. I have a friend in the enforcers... Well, I had a friend. He perished when those bloody degenerates went mad with warp sorcery."

traits.locale_text: "Erinnert mich nicht daran. Ich habe einen Freund bei den Enforcers. Das heißt, ich hatte einen Freund. Er starb, als diese verdammten Degenerierten mit Warp-Zauberei durchgedreht haben."

languages.text: « M'en parle pas. J'ai un ami prévôt. Enfin, plus maintenant... Il est mort quand ces malades sont devenus fous à cause de la sorcellerie du Warp. »
languages.original_text: "Don't even remind me. I have a friend in the enforcers... Well, I had a friend. He perished when those bloody degenerates went mad with warp sorcery."

traits.locale_text: « M'en parle pas. J'ai un ami prévôt. Enfin, plus maintenant... Il est mort quand ces malades sont devenus fous à cause de la sorcellerie du Warp. »

languages.text: "Hiç hatırlatma. Güvenlikte bir arkadaşım var... Vardı daha doğrusu. Öteboyut sahirliğinin delirttiği şerefsizler yüzünden öldü."
languages.original_text: "Don't even remind me. I have a friend in the enforcers... Well, I had a friend. He perished when those bloody degenerates went mad with warp sorcery."

traits.locale_text: "Hiç hatırlatma. Güvenlikte bir arkadaşım var... Vardı daha doğrusu. Öteboyut büyülerinden deliren lanet pislikler yüzünden öldü."
